title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Permanent change rarely happens overnight. You may struggle to control cravings and curb challenging behaviors today. Its essential to be kind and patient with yourself as you face your very human shortcomings. Fortunately, you dont have to process your feelings alone. Call on friends or relatives if you need extra encouragement or just a listening ear. In fact, your desire for growth might just rub off on others. Playwright August Wilson wrote, Confront the dark parts of yourself, and work to banish them with illumination and forgiveness. Your willingness to wrestle with your demons will cause your angels to sing. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
